name: Interactive-Resume Project
body:
### Welcome to my Interactive Resume Project 
What will I Learned:

I learned basic JavaScript syntax, which includes manipulating data types (like JSON), building loops and creating functions. At the same time, I learned some simple jQuery DOM manipulation methods to build your resume the moment a user opens your website.

To access the code I wrote simply navigate to the file labeled:
```
js/resumeBuilder.js
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
